about_the_game:
"The Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Legend of Shu Han" is a RGP game with a historical theme based on the magnificent and brilliant historical plot of the Three Kingdoms that took place on the land of China. The author has a dream of game development and has just started his career in the gaming industry. Please give me more guidance.

【Rich General Characters】

Liu Bei, Guan Yu, Zhang Fei, Zhao Yun, Zhuge Liang, Cao Cao... have appeared with up to more than 200 characters. In addition, the game focuses on portraying an imagined character named Zhongli Muxue, alluding to the author's imagination of his knowledge, abilities, courage, social life, and image in the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms.

【More than 100 skills and strategies】

Each skill or strategy has an independent performance animation, adding fun to the battle.



【Rich weapons, equipments, and accessories】

The types of item that can be equipped in the game include sword, spear, axe, bow, claw, blade, fan, cuirass, helmet, armguard, boots, shield, book, necklace, ring, and each equipment will generate slots for embedding gemstone.

【A highly strategic turn based battle】

The combat system adopts a turn based combat system. You have enough time to think. Are you ready to challenge various battles?

【Rich historical story of the Three Kingdoms】

The plot narrative timeline of the game starts from Liu Bei's crusade against Yuan Shu and ends with the defeat of Wei to unify China, restoring most of the plots of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms novels related to Liu Bei's army.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8/7/XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G Series/AMD Athlon™ X4 Series
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Series and above / AMD Ryzen Series and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 600 Series and above / AMD Radeon HD 6000 Series and above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Legend of Shu Han" is an RPG game with a theme of the history of the Three Kingdoms that happened in China. In the game, player operates Liu Bei's army to suppress anti Han bandits on the vast land of China, maintain the legitimacy of the Han Dynasty.
